isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - MANIFOLDS AND EXHAUST GAS RECIRCULATION (EGR) - Removal

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, read all safety instructions in the "Safety Information" section of this manual.
To prevent personal injury or death, shift transmission to park or neutral, set parking brake, and block wheels before doing diagnostic or service procedures.
To prevent personal injury or death, make sure the engine has cooled before removing components.

note.para: Engine fluids (oil, fuel, and coolant) are a threat to the environment. Recycle or dispose of engine fluids according to local regulations. Never put engine fluids in the trash, on the ground, in sewers or bodies of water.

figure.caption: Figure 63. Mounting bolts for shielded tube exhaust assembly to exhaust manifold

step1.para: Remove two M8 x 1.25 x 60 bolts securing the shielded tube exhaust assembly at the left exhaust manifold.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, do not let engine fluids stay on your skin. Clean skin and nails using hand cleaner and wash with soap and water. Wash or dispose of clothing and rags contaminated with engine fluids.

step1.para: Remove two M8 x 30 bolts securing the shielded tube exhaust assembly (upper right side). Discard exhaust tube gasket.
Remove the EBP sensor tube fitting and pull tube away from exhaust manifold.

Before removal (engine cold), inspect exhaust manifolds for warpage by inserting a feeler gauge between the manifold and cylinder head exhaust ports. Record values and compare with exhaust manifold specifications . Replace manifold as required.

figure.caption: Figure 66. Removal of left exhaust manifold

calloutgroup.callout1: Exhaust manifold mounting bolt and spacer (8)

step1.para: Remove all eight M8 x 1.25 x 40 exhaust manifold bolts and remove manifold.

figure.caption: Figure 67. Mounting bolts for right exhaust tube assembly

step1.para: Remove two M8 x 1.25 x 60 bolts connecting the right exhaust tube assembly to the right exhaust manifold.

Before removal (engine cold), inspect exhaust manifolds for warpage by inserting a feeler gauge between the manifold and cylinder head exhaust ports. Record values and compare with exhaust manifold specifications . Replace manifold as required.

figure.caption: Figure 68. Mounting bolt and spacer for right exhaust manifold

calloutgroup.callout1: Exhaust manifold mounting bolt and spacer (8)

step1.para: Remove eight M8 x 40 exhaust manifold bolts.
